topic.title: import
topic.shortdesc: You can import data into a region or import an existing cluster configuration into the cluster.

topic.title: import data
topic.shortdesc: Import user data from a file to a region.

body.p: Availability: Online. You must be connected in gfsh to a JMX Manager member to use this command.

row.entry: Required. Region into which data will be imported.

Required. File from which the imported data will be read. The file must have an extension of ".gfd" and must be on the file system of the member (or accessible to that member via NFS) that is being targeted for the import.
Required. Name/Id of a member which hosts the region. The data will be imported from the specified file on the host where the member is running.

body.p: Imports all artifacts of a cluster configuration from a zip file.
Availability: Online. You must be connected in gfsh to a JMX Manager member to use this command.
body.note: Shutdown all data members (servers) before importing a shared configuration.

row.entry: Required. Name of the zip file containing the cluster configuration artifacts to be imported.

body.codeblock: gfsh>import cluster-configuration --zip-file-name=/home/username/myClusterConfig.zip Cluster configuration successfully imported
